GeneralInfo.Name: Black Glass
GeneralInfo.Author: Tgx
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
Developed on Mediaportal 1.1. The resolution is 1280x720 and scales well to full HD.
Black Glass skin is designed to be easy to use and has a simple and clear look. It should be controlled primarily with a remote or a keyboard.
BasicHome screen should be used as default home page.
The skin has been developed using Theatre as layout inspiration and Blue3Wide as codebase, so unsupported plugins should work with Bluewide plugin skin files (apart from some graphical anomalies).
Hope you like it!
GeneralInfo.Tags: skin, 16:9, black glass, black glass nova, fanart
